column4: Hi! I have two computers that connects to the internet by my ubuntu machine. In the network of these two windows pc's i can see the ubuntu machine, but on ubuntu i see the machines, but cant access the files. I use a hub to share the connection and the "samba". My smb.conf = http://pastebin.com/d2b6c5b07 Thanks!
Try asking on forums maybe someone can help you there
